sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的軍隊已經被高技術軍隊取代。

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 數量龐大的軍隊已經被高技術軍隊取代。

sentences.english: Our goal is an Iraq that no longer needs American troops.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是讓伊拉克不再需要美國的軍隊。

sentences.english: Both factions field armies from the Roman Republic.
sentences.chinese: 兩派都派出了羅馬共和國軍隊。

sentences.english: Female citizens may be recruited for active service according to the army's need in accordance with the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 根據軍隊需要，可以按前款規定徵集女性公民服現役。

sentences.english: The kingdom was conquered by the Mongol and Chinese armies of Kublai Khan .
sentences.chinese: 大理王國後來被忽必烈率領的蒙古族和漢族軍隊攻破。

sentences.english: Heavy Armourer can significantly improve the armour available to new and retrained units.
sentences.chinese: 重甲工坊可以爲軍隊提供更爲精良的盔甲。

sentences.english: No one questions China’s civilian control of the military.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人質疑中國文官政府控制着軍隊。

sentences.english: The Rangers were among the most gung-ho soldiers in the Army.
sentences.chinese: 遊騎兵是軍隊中最有衝勁的士兵。

sentences.english: Russia accuses Georgia of secretly massing troops for an invasion of Abkhazia.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯指責格魯吉亞祕密集結軍隊入侵阿布哈茲。

sentences.english: His followers did not carouse, like the troops of many warlord armies.
sentences.chinese: 他的部下也不象許多軍閥的軍隊那樣大喫大喝。

sentences.english: I had a spell in the army before I became a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 我在成爲警察前曾在軍隊幹過一段時間。

sentences.english: When Washington ordered troops into the area, the opposition collapsed without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 在華盛頓下令軍隊開進該地區時，抗爭者不戰而散。

sentences.english: It's not working. We need an army of climate outlaws.
sentences.chinese: 它不掂，我們需要一隊軍隊的氣候亡命之徒。

sentences.english: A occasional chance, He a guns second-hand resell to commons armed force army.
sentences.chinese: 一個偶然的機會，他把槍支轉手倒賣給民間武裝軍隊。

sentences.english: I was in the military for 6 years.
